examples: It's difficult to differentiate between the two varieties.
Es difícil diferenciar entre las dos variedades.
I can't differentiate one variety from another.
No puedo diferenciar una variedad de otra.
The male's yellow beak differentiates it from the female.
El pico amarillo del macho lo diferencia de la hembra.
features which clearly differentiate this product from other similar ones
características que diferencian claramente este producto de otros similares
